Literature.Title: Potent Influenza A Virus Entry Inhibitors Targeting a Conserved Region of Hemagglutinin
Literature.Author: Lin D, Luo Y, Yang G, Li F, Xie X, Chen D, He L, Wang J, Ye C, Lu S, Lv L, Liu S, He J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Madin-Darby canine kidney cells:50% Cytotoxicity=41.38±0.04 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human Influenza A Virus H3N2(IC50 REP=2.37±0.09µM),Human Influenza A Virus H1N1(IC50 REP=2.18±0.02µM),Human Influenza A Virus H1N1 A/PR/8/34(IC50 REP=0.93±0.31µM),Human Influenza A Virus H1N1 A/PR/8/34(IC50 REP=3.67±0.31µM),Human Influenza A Virus H1N1 A/PR/8/34(IC50 REP=0.77±0.10µM),Human Influenza A Virus H1N1 (H3)690 (IC50 REP=1.77±0.48µM),Human Influenza A Virus H1N1 H3(699)(IC50 REP=1.34±0.46µM),Human Influenza B Virus(IC50 REP=0.32±0.08µM)
